name: UTOCAT SAS
goal: Selling software products based on DLT / Blockchain technology in the Finance / Bank / Insurance industries
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
DLT / Blockchain for :
finance (ie trade / post trade), individual privacy, numeric certification, act of property, banking transparency, secrecy of banking activities (+modifications), common register, open banking architecture, investors profiling
